en.responseTime: We aim to get back to you within 5 days
en.emailIfProblems: Send us a message
en.chatDown: The web chat service is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
en.noAgentsAvailable: No agents are available, please try again later.
en.allAgentsBusy: All our web chat agents are busy helping other people. Please try again later or contact us using one of the ways above.
en.chatClosed: Web chat is now closed.\nOpening hours are Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm, Saturday 8am to 2pm.

en.chatOpeningHours: Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm, Saturday 8am to 2pm
en.feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.

jurisdictionDetails.title: Jurisdiction details
jurisdictionDetails.description:
The court has judged that your application does not fall within the jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.

You must have at least one of the following legal connections for your divorce to fall within the jurisdiction of a court in England and Wales:
jurisdictionDetails.reason0: My {{ case.divorceWho }} and I are both habitually resident in England or Wales
jurisdictionDetails.reason1: My {{ case.divorceWho }} and I were last habitually resident in England or Wales and I still live there
jurisdictionDetails.reason2: My {{ case.divorceWho }} is habitually resident in England or Wales
jurisdictionDetails.reason3: I’m habitually resident in England or Wales and have lived here for at least a year
jurisdictionDetails.reason4: I’m domiciled and habitually resident in England or Wales and have lived here for at least six months
jurisdictionDetails.reason5: My {{ case.divorceWho }} and I are both domiciled in England or Wales
jurisdictionDetails.reason6: I believe the courts of England and Wales have jurisdiction on a residual basis

marriageCertTranslation.title: Marriage Certificate Translation
marriageCertTranslation.description: The marriage certificate must be translated and certified by one of the following methods:
marriageCertTranslation.method1:
Statement of truth
The translator of the marriage certificate provides a statment of truth certifying the translation. There are translation services online which inlcude certification as part of their service.
marriageCertTranslation.method2:
Notary public
The marriage certificate is translated and then certified by a notary public. You can find a notary public through either the Notaries Society of the Society of Scrivener Notaries.

marriageCertificate.title: Your original marriage certificate
marriageCertificate.description:
The image of the marriage certificate you shared does not appear to be a scanned copy of the full original.

Please provide a digital photo or scan of the original, or the paper document in the post.

The image must be of the whole document and include the serial / system number and must be readable by court staff.

previousProceedingDetails.title: Previous Proceeding Details
previousProceedingDetails.description: Clarify whether there are, or have ever been, any other legal proceedings related to the marriage. Provide evidence that any previous proceeding has either been dismissed or withdrawn.

caseDetailsStatement.title: Case Details Statement
caseDetailsStatement.description: Clarify your evidence for the chosen reason (legally known as the 'facts') for your divorce.

cy.problemWithThisPage: Cysylltwch â ni i gael cymorth
cy.responseTime: Byddwn yn anelu at ymateb o fewn 5 diwrnod gwaith
cy.emailIfProblems: Anfonwch neges atom
cy.chatDown: Nid yw’r gwasanaeth sgwrsio dros y we ar gael ar hyn o bryd; rhowch gynnig arall arni hwyrach ymlaen.
cy.chatWithAnAgent: Sgwrsio dros y we gydag asiant
cy.noAgentsAvailable: Nid oes asiant ar gael ar hyn o bryd; rhowch gynnig arall arni hwyrach ymlaen.
cy.allAgentsBusy: Mae ein asiantau sgwrsio dros y we i gyd yn brysur ar hyn o bryd yn helpu eraill. Rhowch gynnig arall arni hwyrach ymlaen neu cysylltwch â ni gan ddefnyddio un o’r dulliau uchod.
cy.chatClosed: Mae’r gwasanaeth sgwrsio dros y we nawr ar gau.\nYr oriau agor yw dydd Llun i ddydd Gwener, 8:30am - 5pm.
cy.chatAlreadyOpen: Mae ffenestr sgwrsio dros y we ar agor yn barod.
cy.feedback: Mae hwn yn wasanaeth newydd - bydd eich adborth yn ein helpu ni i’w wella.

jurisdictionDetails.title: Pwerau Cyfreithiol
jurisdictionDetails.description:
Mae’r llys wedi penderfynu nad yw eich cais yn dod o dan gwmpas pwerau cyfreithiol llysoedd Cymru a Lloegr.

Mae’n rhaid ichi fod ag o leiaf un o’r cysylltiadau cyfreithiol canlynol i’ch ysgariad ddod o dan gwmpas pwerau llys yng Nghymru a Lloegr:
jurisdictionDetails.reason0: Rydw i a fy {{ case.divorceWho }} yn preswylio’n arferol yng Nghymru a Lloegr
jurisdictionDetails.reason1: Roeddwn i a fy {{ case.divorceWho }} yn preswylio’n arferol ddiwethaf yng Nghymru a Lloegr ac rwy’n dal i fyw yno
jurisdictionDetails.reason2: Mae fy {{ case.divorceWho }} yn preswylio’n arferol yng Nghymru a Lloegr
jurisdictionDetails.reason3: Rydw i’n preswylio’n arferol yng Nghymru a Lloegr ac wedi byw yma am o leiaf blwyddyn
jurisdictionDetails.reason4: Mae fy nomisil yng Nghymru a Lloegr, rwy’n preswylio’n arferol yma ac rwyf wedi byw yma am o leiaf chwe mis
jurisdictionDetails.reason5: Mae fy nomisil i a fy {{ case.divorceWho }} yng Nghymru a Lloegr
jurisdictionDetails.reason6: Rwy’n credu bod gan lysoedd Cymru a Lloegr bwerau cyfreithiol ar sail weddillol

marriageCertTranslation.title: Cyfieithiad o’r dystysgrif priodas
marriageCertTranslation.description: Rhaid i’r dystysgrif priodas gael ei chyfieithu a’i hardystio drwy ddilyn un o’r dulliau canlynol:
marriageCertTranslation.method1:
Datganiad gwirionedd
Mae cyfieithydd y dystysgrif priodas yn darparu datganiad gwirionedd yn ardystio’r cyfieithiad. Mae yna wasanaethau cyfieithu ar-lein sy’n cynnwys gwasanaeth ardystio.
marriageCertTranslation.method2:
Notari cyhoeddus
Mae’r dystysgrif priodas yn cael ei chyfieithu ac yna ei hardystio gan notari cyhoeddus. Gallwch ddod o hyd i notari cyhoeddus drwy gysylltu â naill ai Cymdeithas y Notarïaid neu Gymdeithas Ysgrifenyddion Notarïaid.

marriageCertificate.title: Eich tystysgrif priodas wreiddiol
marriageCertificate.description:
Nid yw’n ymddangos bod y llun o’r dystysgrif priodas rydych wedi ei rhannu yn gopi wedi ei sganio o’r dystysgrif wreiddiol gyflawn.

Darparwch lun digidol neu gopi wedi ei sganio o’r dystysgrif wreiddiol, neu anfonwch y ddogfen bapur yn y post.

Rhaid i’r llun fod o’r ddogfen gyfan a rhaid i staff y llys allu darllen y rhif cyfresol.

previousProceedingDetails.title: Manylion Achosion Blaenorol
previousProceedingDetails.description: Cadarnhewch p’un a oes, neu a oes wedi bod erioed, unrhyw achosion llys eraill sy’n ymwneud â’r briodas.  Darparwch dystiolaeth bod unrhyw achos blaenorol wedi’i wrthod neu ei dynnu’n ôl.

caseDetailsStatement.title: Datganiad Manylion yr Achos
caseDetailsStatement.description: Esboniwch eich tystiolaeth am y rheswm rydych wedi’i ddewis (sy’n cael ei alw’n gyfreithiol yn ‘ffeithiau’) dros eich ysgariad.
